resources.string:
Let me guide you to get Energy, Relaxation & Sleep with the power of your breath and your concentration.

THE BRAIN

  • You might have noticed that your tricky brain is always busy with a task and during this meditation your only task is to follow the instructions.
  • If your brain is tired it is hard to make decisions therefore this app is designed to be easy to use.
  • By choosing a meditation and listening to the same instructions regularly, it is easier to fully enjoy them. Predictability creates a feeling of security.
  • Concentration is something you create here and now, in the moment.
  • Research shows that as little as five minutes of meditation reduces the level of cortisol (a stress hormone) in your body.

BREATHING

  • How you breathe has a direct affect on your mood.
  • These meditations focus on the kind of breathing which activates our calm and soothing system

MUSIC/SOUNDS

  • The music is adapted to enhance the effect of your meditation.
  • The background sounds can make you more focused.
  • You can choose to be guided with or without music.

USAGE

  • The meditations for sleep can be used to achieve deep relaxation.
  • You can download exercises and use the app in airplane mode.
  • Link to BiMi website, bim-beginnersmind.com
  • On the website you can read about mindfulness and the clinical experience that underlies the app. The website is for anyone who wants inspiration and in-depth.
